title: Library Request: dice-ml
body:
[DiCE]() implements [counterfactual (CF) explanations](https://arxiv.org/abs/1711.00399) that provide this information by showing feature-perturbed versions of the same person who would have received the loan, e.g., you would have received the loan if your income was higher by $10,000. In other words, it provides "what-if" explanations for model output and can be a useful complement to other explanation methods, both for end-users and model developers.

PyPi: https://pypi.org/project/dice-ml/

#### Checklist
- [x] I have completely filled out this template
- [x] I have confirmed that this issue exists on the current `master` branch
- [x] I have confirmed that this is not a duplicate issue by searching [issues](https://github.com/QuantConnect/Lean/issues)
- [x] I have provided detailed steps to reproduce the issue
